ai-patthana15.37:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.37:0.3_0: Talking on disrepute, doing what is skillful,
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_0: Not for the sake of skillful people ...
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_1: There’s no fragrance for skillful qualities, not for the sake of fun. ...
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_2: Not a skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or skillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_4: A mendicant without hindrances give rise to skillful qualities, doesn’t give rise to unprofitable things. ...
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_5: We don’t give rise to skillful qualities, nor do we have a good result.
ai-patthana15.37:1.1_6: This is the section in brief.
